register.reg_long_name: TLB Invalidate by VMID, All at Stage 1 and 2, EL1

purpose_text.para: Invalidates cached copies of translation table entries from TLBs that meet all the following requirements:

content.para: The entry is a stage 1 or stage 2 translation table entry, from any level of the translation table walk.
The entry would be required to translate an address using the Secure EL1&0 translation regime.
If is implemented and enabled, the entry would be used with the current VMID.
The entry would be required to translate an address using the Non-secure EL1&0 translation regime.
If Non-secure EL2 is implemented, the entry would be used with the current VMID.

purpose_text.para: The invalidation applies to the PE that executes this System instruction.

note.para: For the EL1&0 translation regimes, the invalidation applies to both global entries, and non-global entries with any ASID.

attributes_text.para: TLBI VMALLS12E1 is a 64-bit System instruction.

ps.name: TLBI_SYS
